song.englishname: I've Got A Break In My Heart

english.segment1: Love comes and it goes. Never stays inside me. Where it can grow. 'Cause I've got a break in my heart. If you could sing a broken hearted song. You know that I'd sing along. 'Cause I've got a break In my heart
english.segment2: And everything I try to do. Just falls along the wayside. It turns to dust. It never blooms it never lives. It only dies
english.segment3: Where is the mender of broken dreams. Has he given up on me. 'Cause I've got a break in my heart. Who can sing a song of love. And make it stay inside of me. 'Cause I've got a break in my heart
english.segment4: And everything I try to do. Just falls along the wayside. It turns to dust. It never blooms it never lives. It only dies
english.segment5: Love sang me this song. Now he flows forever through every song. 'Cause I've got a break in my heart. Love is the mender of broken dreams. Now he's able to live through me. 'Cause I've got a break in my heart
english.segment6: Now everything I try to do. Just turn to hope when you sing through. The song is love it never hides. It always lives - it never dies
